bill_title: expand certain licensing exemptions regarding money lenders and mortgage lenders.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to expand certain licensing exemptions regarding money lenders and mortgage lenders. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 54-4-37 be amended to read as follows: 54-4-37. The following entities are exempt from the provisions of this chapter: (1) Any state bank and its subsidiary; (2) Any national bank and its subsidiary; (3) Any bank holding company and its subsidiary; (4) Any other federally insured financial institution, its holding company and subsidiary; and (5) Any South Dakota chartered trust company; and (6) Any nonprofit cooperative lender eligible to receive a federal guaranty under section 306 of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended to January 1, 2015, and its affiliates. Section 2. That § 54-14-21 be amended to read as follows: 54-14-21. The following entities are exempt from the requirement of a mortgage lender, mortgage brokerage, or mortgage broker license as required by this chapter: (1) Any state bank and its subsidiary; (2) Any national bank and its subsidiary; (3) Any bank holding company and its subsidiary; (4) Any other federally insured financial institution, and its holding company and subsidiary; and (5) Any South Dakota chartered trust company; and (6) Any nonprofit cooperative lender eligible to receive a federal guaranty under section 306 of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended to January 1, 2015, and its affiliates. Any registered mortgage loan originator, if acting for a depository institution, is exempt from the provisions of this chapter.
